channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: L’Asus Vivobook 14 se décharge de 150 euros chez Boulanger, mais conserve son autonomie de 29 heures
item.description: L'Asus Vivobook 14 se démarque grâce à une impressionnante batterie capable de tenir 29 heures et chez Boulanger, ce laptop chute à 649,99 euros au lieu de 799,99 euros habituellement.

item.title: Experts warn AI advances could lead to 200,000 banking jobs being cut this year
item.description: European banking workers could be at risk of redundancy due to AI after years of job cuts from store closures.

item.title: Samsung's new Freestyle+ portable projector nearly doubles the brightness, and makes the image look better on any surface
item.description: Smarter features and bolder images are exactly what Samsung's projector needed needed — but what about audio and battery power?

item.title: The Morning After: Instagram boss says ‘more practical to fingerprint real media than fake media’
item.description: Instagram’s top exec Adam Mosseri expects AI content to overtake non-AI imagery and discussed the implications for the platform and users. Mosseri shared his thoughts on broader trends he expects to shape Instagram in 2026. “Everything that made creators matter — the ability to be real, to connect, to have a voice that couldn’t be faked — is now suddenly accessible to anyone with the right tools,” he wrote. “The feeds are starting to fill up with synthetic everything.” He added: “There is already a growing number of people who believe, as I do, that it will be more practical to fingerprint rea...

item.title: 24 million fewer vehicles: One year of congestion pricing in New York City
item.description: Traffic is down, commutes are faster, and air quality has improved in America’s largest city in the 12 months since the program took effect. It’s been one full year of congestion pricing in New York City, and downtown Manhattan looks markedly different: 23.7 million fewer vehicles, traffic delays down 25%, and a 22% drop in air pollution, to start....

item.title: Welcome to the Future of Noise Canceling
item.description: The next generation of noise reduction is currently being developed in R&D labs around the world. Take a look at what's to come.

item.title: Best Running Shoes, Tested and Reviewed (2026): Saucony, Nike, Hoka
item.description: We clocked thousands of test miles to bring you the best running shoes for every pace, ability, and running goal.

item.title: What is the release date for When Calls the Heart season 13 episode 1 on Hallmark+?
item.description: After a year-long wait, we're finally returning to Hope Valley. When does When Calls the Heart season 13 episode 1 hit Hallmark?

item.title: Elon Musk affirme que la Tesla est numéro 1 mondiale : les chiffres de Toyota prouvent le contraire (pour le moment)
item.description: Selon Elon Musk, la Tesla Model Y serait la voiture la plus vendue dans le monde. Mais est-ce réellement le cas ? Pas si sûr si on regarde les chiffres de Toyota...

item.title: In 2026, corporate purpose will come to a fork in the road
item.description: Companies that can connect purpose to the bottom line will gain a competitive advantage. For the rest, the idea will fade into the background. If 2025 was the year purpose went quiet, 2026 is when the fork in the road will become impossible to ignore. Insights from the Purpose Collaborative, a 40-member network of impact-driven companies, predict what the year ahead will mean for responsible businesses....

item.title: 10 Best Meal Delivery Services, Tested by an Ex-Restaurant Critic
item.description: Here are the best meal kits in 2026, from Martha Stewart’s meal kit to the best meal delivery on a budget.

item.title: Tesla publie une vidéo impressionnante : une puissance de charge jamais vue sur un camion électrique
item.description: Après avoir dévoilé son Megachargeur capable de délivrer 1 MW, Tesla vient de passer un nouveau cap. Des ingénieurs sont parvenus à atteindre une puissance de 1,2 MW. De quoi charger une voiture électrique en quelques minutes seulement.

item.title: Here's How Long You Should Walk Every Day to Prevent Back Pain
item.description: Back pain is one of the most common chronic diseases in the world. Recent research reveals how much time you should spend walking on a daily basis to prevent it.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for January 2, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for January 2, 2026
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for January 2, 2026
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1657 on January 2 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Formovie S5 : ce mini projecteur laser ultra lumineux s’offre une ristourne de 165 €
item.description: Le Formovie S5, c’est ce genre de vidéoprojecteur qu’on attrape à la volée. Compact, nomade, prêt à passer du salon à la chambre, ou à finir dans un sac à dos direction les vacances. Il affiche une image 4K via une base Full HD, et en ce moment, un code chez AliExpress le fait tomber de 500 € à 335 €, avec une livraison depuis la Pologne.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for January 2, 2026
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: Bonne nouvelle pour le prix des voitures électriques en France avec la hausse du bonus écologique en 2026
item.description: Bonne nouvelle si vous voulez acheter une voiture électrique en 2026 : votre facture devrait être inférieure, grâce au bonus écologique, dont le montant a augmenté pour tous les foyers. On fait le point, avec les fameux coup de pouce CEE.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Z Flip 8 could be lighter than ever — and bigger battery capacities are also rumored
item.description: A new year means new foldables, and we might have learned some more about Samsung's next foldable phones.

item.title: Experts warn PC prices could rise even more in 2026 as RAM costs set to soar higher
item.description: PCs and smartphones could become far more expensive from the second half of 2026 due to memory shortages, experts warn.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for January 2, 2026
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: How Protesters Became Content for the Cops
item.description: The tactics behind protest policing are changing—from one of cooperation to intentional antagonism for political marketing purposes.

item.title: Punkt’s German-made MC03 smartphone comes to the US this spring
item.description: Punkt, the Switzerland-based, privacy-focused phone maker, is trying the whole "smartphone" thing again. The MC03 improves on some of the disappointing features of its previous effort, the MC02, while maintaining its security focus. Likewise, its software still comes with a subscription fee: the first year is included free, but it's $12 per month after that. […]...

item.title: The Trump phone just missed another release date
item.description: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it's missed yet another of its promised release dates. When we started writing about Trump Mobile regularly, it all […]

item.title: Minimal phone pioneer Punkt is back with a new privacy-focused model at CES
item.description: The Swiss minimal phone pioneer Punkt is back with another model, the MC03. The new handset continues Punkt's focus on privacy, security and digital minimalism.If you've never seen Punkt's MP01 and MP02, the company's gorgeously minimal dumb phone line, they're something to behold. (The MP01 is quite literally a museum piece, in New York’s Museum of Modern Art.) Meanwhile, this new MC03 is the company's second stab at a more practical touchscreen smartphone, following 2023’s MC02. What you lose in physical beauty and tactile buttons, you gain in flexibility.As before, the smartphone runs the p...

item.title: These 6 U.S. streets will become scenic pedestrian zones in 2026
item.description: Half a dozen U.S. cities will permanently reduce or remove car traffic on some of their streets. 2026 will be a good year for people who love to walk where cars once drove.

item.title: AI will change the way you shop in 2026
item.description: AI is already helping people find the stuff they need to buy. Next year, we might just let it buy it on our behalf. Imagine this: One day, you won’t have to waste hours of your life doing your most arduous, least favorite forms of shopping. You know what I’m talking about—buying Christmas presents for distant aunts, getting supplies for your kid’s birthday, ordering groceries for dinner....

item.title: Former Grand Theft Auto technical director discusses GTA 6 delay — 'It’s much better if they announce a game and then six months later it comes out'
item.description: A former Grand Theft Auto developer has discussed the multiple GTA 6 delays in a recent interview. Here's the key highlights.
